notes.speech-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES
INTRODUCTION: recycling center is one improvement to my hometown in Mexico
SUPPORTING IDEA 1: first reason
town has no recycling center
SUPPORTING IDEA 2: second reason
school club tried unsuccessfully to create recycling center
CONCLUSION: adding a recycling center would be a big improvement in my hometown

check-list.item-text: I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with an overall topic statement.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
